Step into the afterlife as a gatekeeper in Seven Days in Purgatory, now available as a Chrome Extension! Your task? Judge the souls of the dead as they pass through purgatory. Will they ascend to Heaven, or descend to Hell? The fate of countless souls is in your hands!

Analyze case files, weigh moral dilemmas, and make tough decisions over seven gripping days. With each judgment, the pressure buildsâ€”can you handle the burden? Find out in this quirky, thought-provoking adventure where your moral compass is the ultimate tool.
